creator: timothyreaves@westfieldgrp.com
text:
Transactions would require two objects; Start & Stop.  The transaction simply measures the time 
between the two.

In testing a large (number of pages) application, you will want data on how 
long it takes to complete each stage of the test, not just individual pages or the entire thing.  
This allows a finer grain information gathering to occur.

So throughout the HTTP Request 
elements, the transactions would allow timing of each different aspect of the application.
